cards.name: Bladex
cards.description: Bladex is a sleek, cutting-edge cyberpunk vehicle that has become an icon of the future. Featuring a tapered design and advanced technology, Bladex is a stunning show of speed and agility on the race track, as it slices through the city skyline with ease and precision. Experience the rush of wind and power of this ultimate machine - its performance is second to none!
cards.image_prompt: Bladex::0 a simple techno-blade-type tapered sedan cyberpunk::2, in futuristic skyscrapers, Futuristic nocturnal city backdrop, anime sketch with cyan watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Jetway
cards.description: The Jetway is the ultimate futuristic ride, combining speed and agility to create an unparalleled experience on the suspended highways. The sleek design allows it to glide effortlessly across the track, with advanced aerodynamics providing a thrilling ride that will leave you breathless. With its smooth acceleration, and superior handling capabilities, the Jetway is sure to be the envy of the competition. So strap in and unleash your inner speed demon, as the Jetway is your ticket to cyberpunk glory.
cards.image_prompt: Jetway::0 a basic cyber-boost-type dazzling stealth-bike cyberpunk::2, in suspended futuristic highways, Flashing light effects, anime sketch with light cyan watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Vulcanox
cards.description: Vulcanox is the cyberpunk-style cybercar that dominates the urban jungle. With innovative bio-mechanical scaly armor, it blazes through the streets with lightning speed and precision. Impressively agile and powerful, Vulcanox can out-maneuver and outpace its opponents, leaving them in a cloud of dust. It's the perfect car for daredevils looking to take on the city in style.
cards.image_prompt: Vulcanox::0 a strong bio-mech-type scaly concept-car cyberpunk::2, scaly, in urban jungle, Mysterious and organic atmosphere, anime sketch with light green watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Ruinoid
cards.description: Ruinoid is a cyberpunk masterpiece, an otherworldly fusion of modern tech and post-apocalyptic machinery. With its incredible acceleration and unbeatable power, it can dominate the race track and leave its competitors in the dust. Its sleek and menacing exterior hints at its menacing potential, and its advanced cybernetic components allow it to navigate the toughest terrain with ease. Get behind the wheel of Ruinoid, and prepare to experience the thrill of the ultimate cyberpunk racing machine.
cards.image_prompt: Ruinoid::0 a special bio-mech-type biomechanical musclecar cyberpunk::2, biomechanical, in post-apocalyptic cybernetic ruins, Mysterious and organic atmosphere, anime sketch with light green watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Morphee
cards.description: The Morphee is an electric cyberpunk marvel, a sleek machine with a power beyond what can be imagined. Its electromagnetic charge glistening in the sunlight, this beast of the track accelerates from 0-60 in the blink of an eye and zips around corners with unmatched agility. A true force to be reckoned with, the Morphee is a revolutionary electric dream come alive.
cards.image_prompt: Morphee::0 a uncommon electro-drive-type electric hypercar cyberpunk::2, electric, in electromagnetically charged track, Dynamic electric lines background, anime sketch with yellow watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Elevolt
cards.description: The Elevolt is the ultimate energy-driving force in the cyberpunk world. Its sleek, futuristic design allows it to take on any terrain with ease while its advanced electric charging technology ensures a seamless ride. When it comes to the race track, the Elevolt is an unstoppable force that leaves all competitors in its dust. The combination of its energy-driven power and cutting-edge technology makes it the perfect choice for anyone looking for an unbeatable ride.
cards.image_prompt: Elevolt::0 a special electro-drive-type energy-intensive sports-car cyberpunk::2, energy-intensive, in high-tech electric charging station, Sparkling energy effects, anime sketch with yellow watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Pulsarly
cards.description: The Pulsarly is a sleek and aerodynamic cyberpunk scout that whirls its way around the race track like a bolt of lightning. This hi-tech marvel is powered by an advanced electro-drive that propels it forward with remarkable speed and agility. Its sleek design and innovative technology make it a formidable competitor on the track, as its unrivaled acceleration and cornering prowess leave the competition in its dust. The Pulsarly truly is a technological tour de force, cruising through the field of giant wind turbines and solar panels with ease.
cards.image_prompt: Pulsarly::0 a mythical electro-drive-type scout hypercar cyberpunk::2, scout, in field of giant wind turbines and solar panels, Dynamic electric lines background, anime sketch with yellow watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Futurize
cards.description: Futurize is the ultimate high-tech racing machine, designed specifically for the virtual reality arena. Its sleek chassis and custom-designed engine provide maximum acceleration and handling, making it the perfect choice for the serious cyberpunk racer. With its cutting-edge technology and modern design, Futurize is guaranteed to take you to the finish line faster than any competitor. So suit up, strap in, and prepare to experience the thrill of the ultra-fast future.
cards.image_prompt: Futurize::0 a rare nano-racer-type miniature superbike cyberpunk::2, miniature, in virtual reality environment, Abstract digital world backdrop, anime sketch with magenta watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Skytower
cards.description: Skytower is an exhilarating cyberpunk experience like none other. Taking the form of a soaring tower of plasma, competitors must navigate a winding track that whips around like a roller coaster ride. As they accelerate, the track pulses with electric energy, transporting them faster than the speed of sound. The adrenaline of the race will leave racers breathless, and the winner will be the one that reaches the summit first!
cards.image_prompt: Skytower::0 a special plasma-jet-type plasma jet-racer cyberpunk::2, plasma, in track atop a plasma tower, Burning plasma lighting, anime sketch with purple watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Arctopod
cards.description: The Arctopod is a mythical creature of speed, shrouded in a cloak of solar-empowered plasma. On the race track it is a fierce competitor, soaring through the air with agility and finesse, its powerful jets propelling it to unprecedented heights. To the spectators it is a blur, a streak of light that seems to defy all laws of physics and gravity. It is a champion of speed, a champion of the future.
cards.image_prompt: Arctopod::0 a mythical plasma-jet-type solar drone-racer cyberpunk::2, solar, in giant plasma tubes, Energetically torn sky background, anime sketch with purple watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Portalux
cards.description: The Portalux is a revolutionary cyberpunk vehicle, the likes of which have never been seen before. With its quantum dimensional portals, this sleek, high-tech ride blurs the line between reality and the virtual world. On the race track, its sophisticated technology propels it to extraordinary levels of performance, pushing it beyond the limits of the competition. The Portalux is the ultimate choice for fast-paced, high-stakes racing.
cards.image_prompt: Portalux::0 a special quantum-shift-type quantum musclecar cyberpunk::2, quantum, in dimensional portals, Spatio-temporal distortion effects, anime sketch with blue watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Nocturor
cards.description: A swift and silent machine of cybernetic design, Nocturor streaks through the urban jungle like the shadows of night. It outmaneuvers all opponents, glides through every tight corner, and even surprises its driver with its tremendous speed and agility. With its cutting-edge tech and no-nonsense attitude, Nocturor is the ultimate champion of the city streets and the undisputed king of the drone racetrack.
cards.image_prompt: Nocturor::0 a strong stealth-skull-type stealthy drone-racer cyberpunk::2, stealthy, in nocturnal urban environment, Smoke and fog effects, anime sketch with dark gray watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Nightfury
cards.description: Nightfury is a rare and elusive cyberpunk racer, dominating the streets with its cloaking technology and raw power. It prowls the dark urban quarter with silent menace, effortlessly weaving through the shadows to breeze past its opponents. Its legendary maneuverability and speed makes it the envy of the night. Its ferocious acceleration and lightning-fast reflexes make it a champion, and its mysterious energy source remains an unbeatable mystery.
cards.image_prompt: Nightfury::0 a rare stealth-skull-type stealthy drone-racer cyberpunk::2, stealthy, in dark and rainy urban quarter, Dark and contrasting lighting, anime sketch with dark gray watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Noctsure
cards.description: Noctsure is an enigmatic cyberpunk jet-racer that glides through the night sky like a wraith, creating a shadow of awe and fear among its opponents. It dominates the race track with its sleek design and otherworldly capabilities, leaving its competition in the dust. With its razor-sharp reflexes and lightning-fast acceleration, Noctsure is the ultimate urban speed demon.
cards.image_prompt: Noctsure::0 a epic stealth-skull-type shadowy jet-racer cyberpunk::2, shadowy, in nocturnal urban environment, Smoke and fog effects, anime sketch with dark gray watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Armoth
cards.description: Armoth is a legendary cyberpunk giant that dominates the race tracks with its unparalleled force and speed. This mysterious leviathan stalks the shadows of the secret military compound, its massive steel hull a reminder of its unstoppable power. Its thunderous roar can be heard for miles as it blasts down the track, its top speed surpassing any other machine. Armoth is truly a force to be reckoned with!
cards.image_prompt: Armoth::0 a mythical hyper-force-type massive armored-transporter cyberpunk::2, massive, in secret military compound, Speed and motion effects, anime sketch with red watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Maverik
cards.description: Maverik is a legendary cyberpunk with superhuman speed and agility. It's the perfect blend between technology and raw power, soaring across the track with incredible ease. Maverik breaks free from the competition, never content to stay in their dust. It has been banned from many races because of its unstoppable ability to dominate the competition. When Maverik is let loose, the track trembles in its wake.
cards.image_prompt: Maverik::0 a legendary hyper-force-type powerful off-road cyberpunk::2, powerful, in secret military compound, Intense and powerful lighting, anime sketch with red watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Gritax
cards.description: The Gritax is a cyberpunk industrial robot designed to be the ultimate off-road race companion. Boasting a cutting-edge mechanical-beast design, it's more than prepared to take on any terrain and challenge at blistering speeds. With its powerful hardware and advanced AI, Gritax is guaranteed to leave your competitors in the dust. So, strap in and get ready for the ride of a lifetime!
cards.image_prompt: Gritax::0 a basic mech-beast-type industrial off-road cyberpunk::2, in robot production facility, Industrial and rugged lighting, anime sketch with orange watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Amotrix
cards.description: The Amotrix is a cyberpunk-inspired machine of immense power and speed. It strides through the streets like a wild beast, rocketing across the finish line before anyone can follow its path. Onlookers are awed by its unbelievable agility in tight turns and powerful bursts of acceleration. With its advanced robotic production, this fantastic transporter is destined to dominate the race track.
cards.image_prompt: Amotrix::0 a uncommon mech-beast-type powerful armored-transporter cyberpunk::2, powerful, in robot production facility, Industrial and rugged lighting, anime sketch with orange watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2

cards.name: Defenderz
cards.description: The Defenderz is an indomitable machine, crafted to dominate the decimated urban battlefields. Its powerful engines roar as it takes to the track, leaving its opponents clutching in its wake. This cybertruck is an unstoppable force, outfitted with the latest in futuristic technology that helps it effortlessly outmaneuver its rivals. With its sleek design and clever balance of power and agility, the Defenderz is guaranteed to make an unforgettable impression on the race track.
cards.image_prompt: Defenderz::0 a rare mech-beast-type mechanical musclecar cyberpunk::2, mechanical, in devastated urban battlefield, Rusty metal and smoke effects, anime sketch with orange watercolor --niji 5 --ar 3:2
